CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Funding_Category__c , "Improved Daily Living" ), "Improved Daily Living" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Funding_Category__c , "Improved Health and Wellbeing" ), "Improved Health and Wellbeing" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Funding_Category__c , "Improved Relationships" ), "Improved Relationships",null )
CustomField.label: Funding Category Text
